title: Slow cooker tender turkey crown
ingredients: ['1 (approx 2.15kg) medium turkey breast crown', 'Salt and ground black pepper to taste', '5 sprigs fresh rosemary, divided', '5 sprigs fresh thyme, divided', '1 onion, chopped and divided', '110g cold butter, sliced', '250g celery leaves, chopped', '375ml white wine, or more to taste']
